data.name: Large 3 rooms, quiet, central, by the canal
reviews: Location ₪4,156 Show price breakdown for 4 nights ₪4,156 for 4 nights 4.97 · 92 reviews Rated 4.97 out of 5 from 92 reviews. Reserve Room in Paris, France 2 bedrooms · · 3 beds · · Private attached bathroom Guest favorite One of the most loved homes on Airbnb, according to guests Rated 4.97 out of 5 stars. 4.97 92 reviews 92 Reviews Stay with Vincent Superhost · · 1 year hosting Listing highlights Top 5% of homes This home is highly ranked based on ratings, reviews, and reliability. Room in a rental unit Your own room in a home, plus access to shared spaces. Free cancellation before December 2 Get a full refund if you change your mind. Some info has been automatically translated. Show original Having once belonged to the writer and poet Antoine de Saint Exupéry ("The Little Prince"), this apartment renovated by an architect (designer kitchen, Zen bathroom) is equipped with all the comforts for your stay. Both very quiet (on courtyard) and overlooking a pedestrian street with all shops, it is ideally located for getting around Paris (with 5 metro stations immediately accessible Place de la République) or to enjoy the exceptional setting of the Canal Saint Martin. The space Your private apartment is located on the 1st floor (no elevator) of an old building (Louis Philippe period). It has a small laundry room shared with the owner (who lives on the upper floor). Accessibility: - all shops directly on the pedestrian street - 30 meters from the Saint Martin canal - 100 meters from the République metro station (5 lines) - 10 minutes from Gare du Nord / L’Est - 20 minutes from Gare de Lyon - 40 minutes from CDG Registration Details 7511014664924 Show more Where you’ll sleep Bedroom 1 1 double bed Bedroom 2 2 single beds Rare find! data.description: Having once belonged to the writer and poet Antoine de Saint Exupéry ("The Little Prince"), this apartment renovated by an architect (designer kitchen, Zen bathroom) is equipped with all the comforts for your stay. Both very quiet (on courtyard) and overlooking a pedestrian street with all shops, it is ideally located for getting around Paris (with 5 metro stations immediately accessible Place de la République) or to enjoy the exceptional setting of the Canal Saint Martin.
